CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, pg. 12, reads: "Grandmother Feted - Little Robin Bullard poses here with her grandmother, Mrs. Margaret Bullard, after the little girl feted her grandmother with a birthday party at 2901 Bedford Ave. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women wearing striped party hats, including Margaret Bullard on left, gathered behind table with bottles of Johnnie Walker and Old Crow, in bedroom, for birthday party for Margaret Bullard, 2801 Bedford Avenue
